Converts HTMLPurifier_ConfigSchema_Interchange to our runtime

Converts HTMLPurifier_ConfigSchema_Interchange to an XML format,

description: Represents a directive ID in the interchange format.

name: HTMLPurifier_ConfigSchema_Interchange_Namespace
description: Interchange component class describing namespaces.

Generic schema interchange format that can be converted to a runtime
representation (HTMLPurifier_ConfigSchema) or HTML documentation. Members
are completely validated.

HTMLPurifier_Printer_ConfigForm_NullDecorator

name: HTMLPurifier

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrCollections
description: Defines common attribute collections that modules reference

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef
description: Base class for all validating attribute definitions.

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform
description: Processes an entire attribute array for corrections needing multiple values.

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTypes
description: Provides lookup array of attribute types to HTMLPurifier_AttrDef objects

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrValidator
description:
Validates the attributes of a token. Doesn't manage required attributes
very well. The only reason we factored this out was because RemoveForeignElements
also needed it besides ValidateAttributes.

name: HTMLPurifier_Bootstrap
description:
Bootstrap class that contains meta-functionality for HTML Purifier such as
the autoload function.

name: HTMLPurifier_Definition
description:
Super-class for definition datatype objects, implements serialization
functions for the class.

name: HTMLPurifier_CSSDefinition
description: Defines allowed CSS attributes and what their values are.

name: HTMLPurifier_ChildDef
description: Defines allowed child nodes and validates tokens against it.

name: HTMLPurifier_Config
description: Configuration object that triggers customizable behavior.

name: HTMLPurifier_ConfigSchema
description: Configuration definition, defines directives and their defaults.

name: HTMLPurifier_Context
description: Registry object that contains information about the current context.

name: HTMLPurifier_DefinitionCache
description:
Abstract class representing Definition cache managers that implements
useful common methods and is a factory.

name: HTMLPurifier_DefinitionCacheFactory
description: Responsible for creating definition caches.

name: HTMLPurifier_Doctype
description:
Represents a document type, contains information on which modules
need to be loaded.

name: HTMLPurifier_ElementDef
description:
Structure that stores an HTML element definition. Used by
HTMLPurifier_HTMLDefinition and HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule.

name: HTMLPurifier_Encoder
description: A UTF-8 specific character encoder that handles cleaning and transforming.

name: HTMLPurifier_EntityLookup
description: Object that provides entity lookup table from entity name to character

name: HTMLPurifier_EntityParser
description: Handles referencing and derefencing character entities

name: HTMLPurifier_ErrorCollector
description:
Error collection class that enables HTML Purifier to report HTML
problems back to the user

name: HTMLPurifier_ErrorStruct
description:
Records errors for particular segments of an HTML document such as tokens,
attributes or CSS properties. They can contain error structs (which apply
to components of what they represent), but their main purpose is to hold
errors applying to whatever struct is being used.

name: HTMLPurifier_Exception
description:
Global exception class for HTML Purifier; any exceptions we throw
are from here.

name: HTMLPurifier_Filter
description: Represents a pre or post processing filter on HTML Purifier's output

name: HTMLPurifier_Generator
description: Generates HTML from tokens.

name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLDefinition
description:
Definition of the purified HTML that describes allowed children,
attributes, and many other things.

name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule
description:
Represents an XHTML 1.1 module, with information on elements, tags
and attributes.

name: HTMLPurifier_IDAccumulator
description: Component of HTMLPurifier_AttrContext that accumulates IDs to prevent dupes

name: HTMLPurifier_Injector
description: Injects tokens into the document while parsing for well-formedness.

name: HTMLPurifier_Language
description:
Represents a language and defines localizable string formatting and
other functions, as well as the localized messages for HTML Purifier.

name: HTMLPurifier_LanguageFactory
description:
Class responsible for generating HTMLPurifier_Language objects, managing
caching and fallbacks.

name: HTMLPurifier_Length
description:
Represents a measurable length, with a string numeric magnitude
and a unit. This object is immutable.

name: HTMLPurifier_Lexer
description: Forgivingly lexes HTML (SGML-style) markup into tokens.

name: HTMLPurifier_PercentEncoder
description: Class that handles operations involving percent-encoding in URIs.

name: HTMLPurifier_Strategy
description: Supertype for classes that define a strategy for modifying/purifying tokens.

name: HTMLPurifier_StringHash
description:
This is in almost every respect equivalent to an array except
that it keeps track of which keys were accessed.

name: HTMLPurifier_StringHashParser
description: Parses string hash files. File format is as such:

name: HTMLPurifier_TagTransform
description: Defines a mutation of an obsolete tag into a valid tag.

name: HTMLPurifier_Token

name: HTMLPurifier_TokenFactory
description: Factory for token generation.

name: HTMLPurifier_URI
description: HTML Purifier's internal representation of a URI.

name: HTMLPurifier_URIFilter
description: Chainable filters for custom URI processing.

name: HTMLPurifier_URIParser

Parses a URI into the components and fragment identifier as specified

name: HTMLPurifier_URIScheme
description: Validator for the components of a URI for a specific scheme

name: HTMLPurifier_URISchemeRegistry
description: Registry for retrieving specific URI scheme validator objects.

name: HTMLPurifier_UnitConverter

Class for converting between different unit-lengths as specified by
CSS.

Parses string representations into their corresponding native PHP
variable type. The base implementation does a simple type-check.

name: HTMLPurifier_VarParserException
description: Exception type for HTMLPurifier_VarParser

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS
description: Validates the HTML attribute style, otherwise known as CSS.

description: Validates a keyword against a list of valid values.

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_Integer
description: Validates an integer.

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_Lang
description: Validates the HTML attribute lang, effectively a language code.

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_Switch

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_Text
description: Validates arbitrary text according to the HTML spec.

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_URI
description: Validates a URI as defined by RFC 3986.

description: Validates a number as defined by the CSS spec.

description: Validates shorthand CSS property background.

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_BackgroundPosition
description: Validates the value of background-position.

description: Validates the border property as defined by CSS.

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_Color
description: Validates Color as defined by CSS.

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_Composite

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_DenyElementDecorator

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_Filter
description: Microsoft's proprietary filter: CSS property

description: Validates shorthand CSS property font.

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_ListStyle

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_Percentage

description: Validates the value for the CSS property text-decoration

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_HTML_ID

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_BdoDir
description: Post-trasnform that ensures that bdo tags have the dir attribute set.

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_BgColor
description: Pre-transform that changes deprecated bgcolor attribute to CSS.

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_BoolToCSS
description: Pre-transform that changes converts a boolean attribute to fixed CSS

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_Border
description: Pre-transform that changes deprecated border attribute to CSS.

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_EnumToCSS
description:
Generic pre-transform that converts an attribute with a fixed number of

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_ImgRequired
description:
Transform that supplies default values for the src and alt attributes
in img tags, as well as prevents the img tag from being removed
because of a missing alt tag. This needs to be registered as both
a pre and post attribute transform.

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_ImgSpace
description: Pre-transform that changes deprecated hspace and vspace attributes to CSS

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_Input
description:
Performs miscellaneous cross attribute validation and filtering for
input elements. This is meant to be a post-transform.

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_Lang
description: Post-transform that copies lang's value to xml:lang (and vice-versa)

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_Length
description: Class for handling width/height length attribute transformations to CSS

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_Name
description: Pre-transform that changes deprecated name attribute to ID if necessary

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_SafeObject
description: Writes default type for all objects. Currently only supports flash.

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_SafeParam
description:
Validates name/value pairs in param tags to be used in safe objects. This
will only allow name values it recognizes, and pre-fill certain attributes
with required values.

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_ScriptRequired
description: Implements required attribute stipulation for <script>

name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_Textarea
description: Sets height/width defaults for <textarea>

name: HTMLPurifier_ChildDef_Chameleon

description: Custom validation class, accepts DTD child definitions

name: HTMLPurifier_ChildDef_Empty

description: Definition that allows a set of elements, but disallows empty children.

description: Definition that allows a set of elements, and allows no children.

description: Takes the contents of blockquote when in strict and reformats for validation.

name: HTMLPurifier_ChildDef_Table
description: Definition for tables

name: HTMLPurifier_DefinitionCache_Decorator_Cleanup
description:
Definition cache decorator class that cleans up the cache
whenever there is a cache miss.

name: HTMLPurifier_DefinitionCache_Decorator_Memory
description:
Definition cache decorator class that saves all cache retrievals
to PHP's memory; good for unit tests or circumstances where
there are lots of configuration objects floating around.

name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Bdo
description:
XHTML 1.1 Bi-directional Text Module, defines elements that
declare directionality of content. Text Extension Module.

name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Edit
description:
XHTML 1.1 Edit Module, defines editing-related elements. Text Extension
Module.

name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Forms
description: XHTML 1.1 Forms module, defines all form-related elements found in HTML 4.

name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Hypertext
description: XHTML 1.1 Hypertext Module, defines hypertext links. Core Module.

name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Image
description: XHTML 1.1 Image Module provides basic image embedding.

name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Legacy
description:
XHTML 1.1 Legacy module defines elements that were previously
deprecated.

name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_List
description: XHTML 1.1 List Module, defines list-oriented elements. Core Module.

name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Object
description: XHTML 1.1 Object Module, defines elements for generic object inclusion

name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Presentation
description:
XHTML 1.1 Presentation Module, defines simple presentation-related
markup. Text Extension Module.

name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Proprietary
description: Module defines proprietary tags and attributes in HTML.

name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Ruby
description:
XHTML 1.1 Ruby Annotation Module, defines elements that indicate
short runs of text alongside base text for annotation or pronounciation.

name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_SafeEmbed
description: A "safe" embed module. See SafeObject. This is a proprietary element.

name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_SafeObject
description:
A "safe" object module. In theory, objects permitted by this module will
be safe, and untrusted users can be allowed to embed arbitrary flash objects
(maybe other types too, but only Flash is supported as of right now).

name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Scripting
description:
XHTML 1.1 Scripting module, defines elements that are used to contain
information pertaining to executable scripts or the lack of support
for executable scripts.

name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_StyleAttribute
description:
XHTML 1.1 Edit Module, defines editing-related elements. Text Extension
Module.

name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Tables
description: XHTML 1.1 Tables Module, fully defines accessible table elements.

name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Target
description: XHTML 1.1 Target Module, defines target attribute in link elements.

name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Text
description: XHTML 1.1 Text Module, defines basic text containers. Core Module.

name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Tidy
description:
Abstract class for a set of proprietary modules that clean up (tidy)
poorly written HTML.

name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Tidy_Name
description: Name is deprecated, but allowed in strict doctypes, so onl

name: HTMLPurifier_Injector_AutoParagraph
description:
Injector that auto paragraphs text in the root node based on
double-spacing.

name: HTMLPurifier_Injector_DisplayLinkURI
description: Injector that displays the URL of an anchor instead of linking to it, in addition to showing the text of the link.

name: HTMLPurifier_Injector_Linkify
description: Injector that converts http, https and ftp text URLs to actual links.

name: HTMLPurifier_Injector_PurifierLinkify
description:
Injector that converts configuration directive syntax %Namespace.Directive
to links

name: HTMLPurifier_Injector_SafeObject
description:
Adds important param elements to inside of object in order to make
things safe.

name: HTMLPurifier_Lexer_DOMLex
description: Parser that uses PHP 5's DOM extension (part of the core).

name: HTMLPurifier_Lexer_DirectLex
description: Our in-house implementation of a parser.

name: HTMLPurifier_Strategy_Composite
description: Composite strategy that runs multiple strategies on tokens.

name: HTMLPurifier_Strategy_Core
description: Core strategy composed of the big four strategies.

name: HTMLPurifier_Strategy_FixNesting
description: Takes a well formed list of tokens and fixes their nesting.

name: HTMLPurifier_Strategy_MakeWellFormed
description: Takes tokens makes them well-formed (balance end tags, etc.)

name: HTMLPurifier_Strategy_RemoveForeignElements
description: Removes all unrecognized tags from the list of tokens.

name: HTMLPurifier_Strategy_ValidateAttributes
description: Validate all attributes in the tokens.

name: HTMLPurifier_TagTransform_Font
description: Transforms FONT tags to the proper form (SPAN with CSS styling)

name: HTMLPurifier_TagTransform_Simple
description:
Simple transformation, just change tag name to something else,
and possibly add some styling. This will cover most of the deprecated
tag cases.

name: HTMLPurifier_Token_Comment
description: Concrete comment token class. Generally will be ignored.

name: HTMLPurifier_Token_Tag
description: Abstract class of a tag token (start, end or empty), and its behavior.

name: HTMLPurifier_Token_Empty
description: Concrete empty token class.

name: HTMLPurifier_Token_End
description: Concrete end token class.

name: HTMLPurifier_Token_Start
description: Concrete start token class.

name: HTMLPurifier_Token_Text
description: Concrete text token class.

name: HTMLPurifier_URIScheme_ftp
description: Validates ftp (File Transfer Protocol) URIs as defined by generic RFC 1738.

name: HTMLPurifier_URIScheme_http
description: Validates http (HyperText Transfer Protocol) as defined by RFC 2616

name: HTMLPurifier_URIScheme_https
description: Validates https (Secure HTTP) according to http scheme.

name: HTMLPurifier_URIScheme_mailto
description: Validates mailto (for E-mail) according to RFC 2368

name: HTMLPurifier_URIScheme_news
description: Validates news (Usenet) as defined by generic RFC 1738

name: HTMLPurifier_URIScheme_nntp
description: Validates nntp (Network News Transfer Protocol) as defined by generic RFC 1738

name: HTMLPurifier_VarParser_Flexible
description:
Performs safe variable parsing based on types which can be used by
users. This may not be able to represent all possible data inputs,
however.

name: HTMLPurifier_VarParser_Native
description:
This variable parser uses PHP's internal code engine. Because it does
this, it can represent all inputs; however, it is dangerous and cannot
be used by users.

name: CTypedList
description: CTypedList represents a list whose items are of the certain type.

name: CConfiguration
description: CConfiguration represents an array-based configuration.

name: CList
description: CList implements an integer-indexed collection class.

name: CStack
description: CStack implements a stack.

name: CListIterator
description: CListIterator implements an interator for {@link CList}.

name: CMapIterator
description: CMapIterator implements an interator for {@link CMap}.

name: CQueueIterator
description: CQueueIterator implements an interator for {@link CQueue}.

name: CAttributeCollection
description: CAttributeCollection implements a collection for storing attribute names and values.

name: CMap
description: CMap implements a collection that takes key-value pairs.

name: CStackIterator
description: CStackIterator implements an interator for {@link CStack}.

name: CQueue
description: CQueue implements a queue.

name: CController
description: CController manages a set of actions which deal with the corresponding user requests.

name: CUrlManager
description: CUrlManager manages the URLs of Yii Web applications.

name: CUrlRule
description: CUrlRule represents a URL formatting/parsing rule.

name: CPhpAuthManager
description: CPhpAuthManager represents an authorization manager that stores authorization information in terms of a PHP script file.

name: CAuthAssignment
description: CAuthAssignment represents an assignment of a role to a user.

name: CWebUser
description: CWebUser represents the persistent state for a Web application user.

name: CAccessControlFilter
description: CAccessControlFilter performs authorization checks for the specified actions.

name: CAccessRule
description: CAccessRule represents an access rule that is managed by {@link CAccessControlFilter}.

name: CBaseUserIdentity
description: CBaseUserIdentity is a base class implementing {@link IUserIdentity}.

name: CDbAuthManager
description: CDbAuthManager represents an authorization manager that stores authorization information in database.

name: CAuthManager
description: CAuthManager is the base class for authorization manager classes.

name: CAuthItem
description: CAuthItem represents an authorization item.

name: CUserIdentity
description: CUserIdentity is a base class for representing identities that are authenticated based on a username and a password.

name: CHttpSession
description: CHttpSession provides session-level data management and the related configurations.

name: CPradoViewRenderer
description: CPradoViewRenderer implements a view renderer that allows users to use a template syntax similar to PRADO templates.

name: CViewRenderer
description: CViewRenderer is the base class for view renderer classes.

name: CCacheHttpSession
description: CCacheHttpSession implements a session component using cache as storage medium.

name: CWebModule
description: CWebModule represents an application module.

name: CExtController
description: CExtController is the base class for controllers distributed as extension.

name: CHttpCookie
description: A CHttpCookie instance stores a single cookie, including the cookie name, value, domain, path, expire, and secure.

name: CDbHttpSession
description: CDbHttpSession extends {@link CHttpSession} by using database as session data storage.

name: COutputEvent
description: COutputEvent represents the parameter for events related with output handling.

name: CTabView
description: CTabView displays contents in multiple tabs.

name: CCaptchaAction
description: CCaptchaAction renders a CAPTCHA image.

name: CCaptcha
description: CCaptcha renders a CAPTCHA image element.

name: CClipWidget
description: CClipWidget records its content and makes it available elsewhere.

name: CContentDecorator
description: CContentDecorator decorates the content it encloses with the specified view.

name: CFilterWidget
description: CFilterWidget is the base class for widgets that can also be used as filters.

name: CMaskedTextField
description: CMaskedTextField generates a masked text field.

name: CMarkdown
description: CMarkdown converts the captured content from markdown syntax to HTML code.

name: CFlexWidget
description: CFlexWidget embeds a Flex 3.x application into a page.

name: CInputWidget
description: CInputWidget is the base class for widgets that collect user inputs.

name: CStarRating
description: CStarRating displays a star rating control that can collect user rating input.

name: COutputProcessor
description: COutputProcessor transforms the content into a different format.

name: CTextHighlighter
description: CTextHighlighter does syntax highlighting for its body content.

name: CMultiFileUpload
description: CMultiFileUpload generates a file input that can allow uploading multiple files at a time.

name: CHtmlPurifier
description: CHtmlPurifier is wrapper of {@link http://htmlpurifier.org HTML Purifier}.

name: CTreeView
description: CTreeView displays a tree view of hierarchical data.

name: CWidget
description: CWidget is the base class for widgets.

name: COutputCache
description: COutputCache enables caching the output generated by an action or a view fragment.

name: CAutoComplete
description: CAutoComplete generates an auto-complete text field.

name: CBasePager
description: CBasePager is the base class for all pagers.

name: CLinkPager
description: CLinkPager displays a list of hyperlinks that lead to different pages of target.

name: CListPager
description: CListPager displays a dropdown list that contains options leading to different pages of target.

name: CSort
description: CSort represents information relevant to sorting.

name: CJavaScript
description: CJavaScript is a helper class containing JavaScript-related handling functions.

name: CHtml
description: CHtml is a static class that provides a collection of helper methods for creating HTML views.

name: CGoogleApi
description: CGoogleApi provides helper methods to easily access {@link http://code.google.com/apis/ajax/ Google AJAX APIs}.

name: CJSON
description: CJSON converts PHP data to and from JSON format.

name: CBaseController
description: CBaseController is the base class for {@link CController} and {@link CWidget}.

name: CHttpSessionIterator
description: CHttpSessionIterator implements an interator for {@link CHttpSession}.

name: CFormModel
description: CFormModel represents a data model that collects HTML form inputs.

name: CWebServiceAction
description: CWebServiceAction implements an action that provides Web services.

name: CWebService
description: CWebService encapsulates SoapServer and provides a WSDL-based web service.

name: CSoapObjectWrapper
description: CSoapObjectWrapper is a wrapper class internally used when SoapServer::setObject() is not defined.

name: CWsdlGenerator
description: CWsdlGenerator generates the WSDL for a given service class.

name: CInlineAction
description: CInlineAction represents an action that is defined as a controller method.

name: CViewAction
description: CViewAction represents an action that displays a view according to a user-specified parameter.

name: CAction
description: CAction is the base class for all controller action classes.

name: CPagination
description: CPagination represents information relevant to pagination.

name: CThemeManager
description: CThemeManager manages the themes for the Web application.

name: CUploadedFile
description: CUploadedFile represents the information for an uploaded file.

name: CTheme
description: CTheme represents an application theme.

name: CAssetManager
description: CAssetManager is a Web application component that manages private files (called assets) and makes them accessible by Web clients.

name: CHttpRequest
description: CHttpRequest encapsulates the $_SERVER variable and resolves its inconsistency among different Web servers.

name: CCookieCollection
description: CCookieCollection implements a collection class to store cookies.

name: CFilter
description: CFilter is the base class for all filters.

name: CFilterChain
description: CFilterChain represents a list of filters being applied to an action.

name: CInlineFilter
description: CInlineFilter represents a filter defined as a controller method.

name: CClientScript
description: CClientScript manages JavaScript and CSS stylesheets for views.

name: CWebApplication
description: CWebApplication extends CApplication by providing functionalities specific to Web requests.
